cards.name: Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts a spell that targets only a single creature other than Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief, you may copy that spell. The copy targets Ivy. (A copy of an Aura spell becomes a token.)

rulings.text: The second ability triggers whenever a player casts a spell that targets only one creature and no other object or player. It doesn’t matter who controls the creature.
If a spell has multiple targets but all of them are the same creature, Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief’s second ability will trigger.
The copy is created even if the spell that caused the ability to trigger has been countered by the time the ability resolves. The copy resolves before the original spell.
If Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief isn’t a legal target for the spell, no copy can be created.
The copy that Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief’s second ability creates is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast.” Other abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger.
If the spell that’s copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy will have the same mode. You can’t choose a different one.
If the spell that’s copied has an X whose value was determined as it was cast, the copy has the same value of X.

The controller of a copy can’t choose to pay any additional costs for the copy. However, effects based on any additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too. Notably, if the spell you copy was kicked, the copies will also be kicked.

cards.name: Jodah, the Unifier
cards.text:
Legendary creatures you control get +X/+X, where X is the number of legendary creatures you control.
Whenever you cast a legendary spell from your hand, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a legendary nonland card with lesser mana value. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

rulings.text: Both Jodah, the Unifier’s triggered ability and the spell cast with that ability resolve before the spell that caused the ability to trigger, even if the original spell was countered in response.
You exile the cards face up. All players will be able to see them.
The legendary nonland card exiled may be cast immediately. If you do not cast it immediately, you don’t get to cast it at a later time.

The types and mana value of a double-faced card in exile are determined by the characteristics of its front face. The mana value of a split card is the total mana value of both halves of the split card added together.
If the legendary nonland card exiled this way is a modal double-faced card, and the back face is also a nonland card face, you may cast either face, even if the back face isn’t legendary.
If you choose not to cast the card, it remains in exile. The rest of the cards will be put on the bottom of your library in a random order.

If you cast a spell “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t choose to cast it for any alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast the spell.
If the card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X when casting it without paying its mana cost.

The mana value of the spell that caused the ability to trigger is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was. If that spell had an {X} in its cost, include the chosen value for X when determining its mana value.

If you exile your entire library without exiling a legendary nonland card with lesser mana value, you will randomize the exiled cards and they again become your library, ending the effect. You will not continue to exile and shuffle your library forever.

In most cases where the value of X isn’t defined in the text of a card, its controller chooses the value of X. However, the X in King Darien’s name is always 10.
XLVIII is forty-eight.

rulings.text: Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.

cards.name: Najal, the Storm Runner
cards.text:
You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.
Whenever Najal, the Storm Runner attacks, you may pay {2}. If you do, when you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

rulings.text: If the spell that’s copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy created by Najal’s delayed triggered ability will have the same mode or modes. You can’t choose different ones.

If the spell that’s copied has damage divided as it was cast, the division can’t be changed (although the targets receiving that damage still can). The same is true of spells that distribute counters.

You can’t choose to pay any additional costs for the copy created by Najal’s delayed triggered ability. However, effects based on any additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too.
The copies that Najal’s ability creates are created on the stack, so they’re not “cast.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger.

cards.text:
Reach
If a creature an opponent controls would die, exile it instead. When you do, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

rulings.text: If a creature an opponent controls would die, and both Nemata and another effect are trying to exile it instead, that opponent chooses which effect to apply. cards.name: Queen Allenal of Ruadach
cards.text:
Queen Allenal of Ruadach's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
If one or more creature tokens would be created under your control, those tokens plus a 1/1 white Soldier creature token are created instead.

rulings.text: Queen Allenal of Ruadach’s first ability counts itself, so its power and toughness will always be at least 1/1.

The additional Soldier token won’t have any abilities the other tokens were created with. Anything else specified in the effect creating the tokens (such as tapped, attacking, “That token gains haste,” or “Exile that token at end of combat”) applies to both the original tokens and the Soldier.

If an effect changes under whose control a token would be created, that effect applies before Queen Allenal’s effect applies. If an effect changes under whose control a token would enter the battlefield, that effect applies after Queen Allenal’s effect is able to be applied.

cards.name: Ratadrabik of Urborg

rulings.text: The token copies the creature as it last existed on the battlefield before it died, not as it exists in the graveyard.

Except for power and toughness, the token copies only what was printed on the original creature (unless that creature is copying something else; see below) and adds the color black and the creature type Zombie. It doesn’t copy whether that creature was tapped or untapped, whether it had any counters on it or Auras or Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that had changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If the copied creature has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
If the copied creature is a token, the new token that’s created copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that created that token, with the exceptions noted above.
If the copied creature is copying something else, then the token enters the battlefield as whatever that creature copied, with the exceptions noted above.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied creature will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” or “[this creature] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the chosen creature will also work.

cards.name: Rith, Liberated Primeval

rulings.text: If a permanent has more than one ward ability, the abilities trigger individually. The spell or ability will be countered if either of the ward costs aren’t paid.

A creature has been dealt excess damage if one or more sources dealt more damage to it than the minimum amount of damage required to be lethal damage. In most cases, this means damage greater than its toughness, but consider the damage already dealt to it that turn.
A planeswalker is dealt excess damage if it’s dealt damage greater than its current loyalty.

Even 1 damage dealt to a creature from a source with deathtouch is considered lethal damage, so any amount greater than that will cause excess damage to be dealt, even if the total amount of damage isn’t greater than the creature’s toughness. Note that a source of damage having deathtouch has no effect on damage dealt to planeswalkers.

It doesn’t matter whether a creature, spell, or ability you control deals the excess damage, only that excess damage was dealt at some point during the turn. For example, if a 4/4 creature an opponent controls is dealt 2 damage by a spell you control and later that turn is dealt 3 damage by a spell another player controls, Rith’s ability will trigger.

Rith’s ability will trigger as long as an opponent controlled the creature as excess damage was dealt to it, even if the creature is no longer on the battlefield or you control it at the end of the turn.

cards.name: Rivaz of the Claw
cards.text:
Menace
{T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon creature spells.
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard.
Whenever you cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard, it gains "When this creature dies, exile it."

rulings.text: You can use mana generated by the activated ability to pay an alternative cost (such as an escape cost) or an additional cost to cast a Dragon spell. It’s not limited to paying just that spell’s mana cost.
The casting permission granted by Rivaz’s third ability doesn’t change when you may cast the spell from your graveyard.
Once you begin casting a spell from your graveyard, it immediately moves to the stack. Players can’t take any other actions until you’re done casting the spell.
The last ability triggers when you cast a Dragon creature spell from your graveyard for any reason. It triggers even if you didn’t use mana generated by Rivaz’s activated ability to pay its costs.

The ability that the spell gains as Rivaz’s last ability resolves continues to apply to the permanent that spell becomes after the spell resolves, even if it stops being a Dragon or stops being a creature.
The ability that the spell gains only applies to it once it’s on the battlefield. If the spell is countered before it resolves, that ability will not exile it.

cards.name: Soul of Windgrace
cards.text:
Whenever Soul of Windgrace enters the battlefield or attacks, you may put a land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control.
{G}, Discard a land card: You gain 3 life.
{1}{R}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.
{2}{B}, Discard a land card: Soul of Windgrace gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.

rulings.text: If Soul of Windgrace enters the battlefield attacking, its first ability triggers only once that combat.

You choose the land card as the triggered ability resolves. Once the ability has begun to resolve, no player may take actions until it finishes resolving. Notably, they can’t respond to the land you choose by removing it from your graveyard.
You may activate Soul of Windgrace’s last ability even if it’s already tapped. It will still gain indestructible.

cards.name: Stenn, Paranoid Partisan
cards.text:
As Stenn, Paranoid Partisan enters the battlefield, choose a card type other than creature or land.
Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
{1}{W}{U}: Exile Stenn. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

rulings.text: The cost reduction applies only to generic mana in the cost of spells you cast of the chosen card type.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying (such as a flashback cost), add any cost increases (such as kicker costs), then apply any cost reductions (such as that of Stenn’s second ability). The mana value of the spell is determined by only its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast that spell was.

If Stenn’s controller activates its last ability during a player’s end step, the delayed triggered ability that returns it to the battlefield won’t trigger until the next time an end step begins, usually during the next player’s turn.

foreignNames.name: Vohar, profanador vodaliano

{2}, Sacrifiez Vohar, profanateur vodalian : Vous pouvez lancer, ce tour-ci, une carte d'éphémère ou de rituel ciblée depuis votre cimetière. Si ce sort devait être mis dans votre cimetière, exilez-le à la place. N'activez que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel.

cards.name: Zar Ojanen, Scion of Efrava
cards.text: Domain — Whenever Zar Ojanen, Scion of Efrava becomes tapped, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with toughness less than the number of basic land types among lands you control.
cards.flavor: "I carry my home in my heart."

rulings.text: Zar Ojanen, Scion of Efrava’s ability is a triggered ability, not an activated ability. It doesn’t allow you to tap it whenever you want; rather, you need some other way of tapping it, such as by attacking.
If Zar Ojanen becomes tapped while casting a spell or activating an ability, that spell or ability resolves after Zar Ojanen’s triggered ability has resolved.
Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.
The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Land types other than basic land types (such as Desert) don’t contribute to domain abilities.

cards.name: Golden Argosy
cards.text:
Whenever Golden Argosy attacks, exile each creature that crewed it this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

rulings.text: Golden Argosy’s triggered ability will only exile creatures that are still on the battlefield as it resolves, and any creatures that crewed it this turn that had already left the battlefield will not be returned.
The exiled creatures will be returned at the beginning of the next end step even if Golden Argosy is no longer on the battlefield at that time.

rulings.text: Domain abilities count the number of basic land types among lands you control, not how many lands you control or how many of any type.
The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Land types other than basic land types (such as Desert) don’t contribute to domain abilities.

cards.name: Karn's Sylex
cards.text:
Karn's Sylex enters the battlefield tapped.
Players can't pay life to cast spells or to activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.
{X}, {T}, Exile Karn's Sylex: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less. Activate only as a sorcery.

rulings.text: If a spell or an activated ability that isn’t a mana ability has a cost that requires a player to pay life, that spell or ability can’t be cast or activated.
Other things may still cause players to pay life, such as a resolving spell or ability.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities are activated abilities (such as cycling) and will have colons in their reminder text.
An activated mana ability is one that produces mana as it resolves, not one that costs mana to activate.
Players may always pay 0 life, even if an effect says they can’t pay life.

rulings.text: Walking Bulwark’s last ability doesn’t actually change any creature’s power. It changes only the amount of combat damage it assigns. All other rules and effects that check power or toughness use the real values. For example, since having two creatures fight doesn’t result in combat damage, an effect that causes the affected creature to fight another creature will still use its power to determine how much damage is dealt.

cards.name: Weatherlight Compleated
cards.text:
Flying
As long as Weatherlight Compleated has four or more phyresis counters on it, it's a Phyrexian creature in addition to its other types.
Whenever a creature you control dies, put a phyresis counter on Weatherlight Compleated. Then draw a card if it has seven or more phyresis counters on it. If it doesn't, scry 1.

rulings.text: If more than one creature dies at the same time, Weatherlight Compleated’s triggered ability will trigger once for each of those creatures. As each of those resolve, its controller will take the instructed actions. For example, if it has no phyresis counters on it and seven creatures die, its controller will put a counter on it and scry 1 as each of the first six instances of the ability resolve, then put a counter on it and draw a card as the last instance resolves.

If Weatherlight Compleated has left the battlefield by the time its triggered ability resolves, you won’t be able to add any counters to it. Whether you draw a card or scry 1 will be determined by the number of counters it had on it before it left the battlefield.
If Weatherlight Compleated is a creature and dies, its last ability will trigger.

If Weatherlight Compleated loses its abilities, the type-changing effect of its second ability will continue to apply to it. This is because effects that change an object’s types are always applied before effects that remove abilities. In that case, if it has four or more phyresis counters on it, it will be a legendary Phyrexian Vehicle artifact creature with no abilities. This is true even if it somehow gained its fourth phyresis counter after losing its abilities.

foreignNames.name: Wetterlicht, vollendet
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Solange auf der Wetterlicht, vollendet, vier oder mehr Phyresemarken liegen, ist sie zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen eine Phyrexianer-Kreatur.
Immer wenn eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, stirbt, lege eine Phyresemarke auf die Wetterlicht, vollendet. Ziehe dann eine Karte, falls auf ihr sieben oder mehr Phyresemarken liegen. Anderenfalls wende Hellsicht 1 an.

Siempre que una criatura que controlas muera, pon un contador de piresis sobre el Vientoligero perfeccionado. Luego roba una carta si tiene siete o más contadores de piresis sobre él. Si no, adivina 1.

Tant que l'Aquilon parachevé a au moins quatre marqueurs « phyrésie » sur lui, c'est une créature Phyrexian en plus de ses autres types.
À chaque fois qu'une créature que vous contrôlez meurt, mettez un marqueur « phyrésie » sur L'Aquilon parachevé. Puis piochez une carte s'il a au moins sept marqueurs "phyrésie" sur lui. Si ce n'est pas le cas, regard 1.

完成化したウェザーライトの上に４個以上のファイレクシア病・カウンターがあるかぎり、これはこれの他のタイプに加えてファイレクシアン・クリーチャーである。

foreignNames.flavor: Einige der Naturgeister und Wraiths, die in Urborg spuken, nehmen an dem Begriff „Geisterstadt" Anstoß.

foreignNames.name: Cenagal embrujado
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {B} o {G}.)
El Cenagal embrujado entra al campo de batalla girado.
foreignNames.flavor: A algunos espíritus y espectros de la naturaleza que moran en Urborg les ofende profundamente el término "pueblo fantasma".

foreignNames.name: Fondrière hantée
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {B} or {G}.)
La Fondrière hantée arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
foreignNames.flavor: Certains des esprits de la nature et des spectres qui hantent Urborg s'offusquent du terme « ville fantôme ».

foreignNames.name: Pantano Infestato
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {B} o {G}.)
Il Pantano Infestato entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Alcuni degli spiriti naturali e degli spettri che infestano Urborg non amano il termine "città fantasma".

foreignNames.name: 憑依されたぬかるみ
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{B}か{G}を加える。）
憑依されたぬかるみはタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: アーボーグに取り憑いている自然の霊や悪霊の中には「ゴーストタウン」という呼称に気を悪くするものもいる。

foreignNames.name: Lodaçal Assombrado
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {B} ou {G}.)
Lodaçal Assombrado entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Alguns espíritos da natureza e aparições que assombram Urborg se ofendem com o termo "cidade fantasma".

foreignNames.name: 遭祟泥沼
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{B}或{G}。）
遭祟泥沼须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 部分盘踞在乌尔博格的精怪和鬼魂觉得「鬼城」这称呼颇不礼貌。

cards.originalText:
({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)
Haunted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Idyllic Beachfront
cards.text:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Idyllic Beachfront enters the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: In the tradition of the original Tolarian Academy, every Tolarian campus is built near a body of water.

foreignNames.name: Idyllischer Strand
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {U}.)
Der Idyllische Strand kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: In der Tradition der ursprünglichen Akademie von Tolaria wird jeder tolarianische Campus in der Nähe eines Gewässers gebaut.

foreignNames.name: Litoral idílico
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {W} o {U}.)
El Litoral idílico entra al campo de batalla girado.
foreignNames.flavor: Según la tradición de la primera Academia tolariana, todos los campus tolarianos se construyen cerca de una masa de agua.

foreignNames.name: Plage idyllique
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {U}.)
La Plage idyllique arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée.
foreignNames.flavor: Dans la tradition de la première Académie tolariane, chaque campus tolarian est construit proche d'une étendue d'eau.

foreignNames.name: Litorale Idilliaco
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {W} o {U}.)
Il Litorale Idilliaco entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Per mantenere viva la tradizione dell'Accademia di Tolaria originale, ogni campus di Tolaria viene eretto nelle vicinanze di uno specchio d'acqua.

foreignNames.name: 理想的な浜方
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{W}か{U}を加える。）
理想的な浜方はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: 元祖トレイリアのアカデミーの伝統にならい、トレイリアの全キャンパスは水際に建設されている。

foreignNames.name: Beira-mar Idílica
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {W} ou {U}.)
Beira-mar Idílica entra no campo de batalha virada.
foreignNames.flavor: Seguindo a tradição da Academia Tolariana original, todo campus tolariano é construído próximo à água.

foreignNames.name: 田园滩岸
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{W}或{U}。）
田园滩岸须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 按照旧陶拉里亚大学院的传统，每个陶拉里亚校园都傍水而建。

cards.originalText:
({T}: Add {W} or {U}.)
Idyllic Beachfront enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Karplusan Forest
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor: Between jagged, snowcapped peaks, the dense bands of hardy evergreens provide the perfect cover for roving bands of orc and goblin raiders.

foreignNames.name: Karplusanischer Wald
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {G}. Der Karplusanische Wald fügt dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Zwischen gezackten, schneebedeckten Gipfeln bieten die dichten Streifen aus robusten immergrünen Pflanzen die perfekte Deckung für umherziehende Ork- und Goblin-Banden.

foreignNames.name: Foresta karplusana
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega {R} o {G}. La Foresta karplusana te hace 1 punto de daño.
foreignNames.flavor: Las densas filas de árboles perennes, enmarcadas por picos escarpados y cubiertos de nieve, son el escondite perfecto para las bandas ambulantes de incursores orcos y trasgos.

foreignNames.name: Forêt de Karpluse
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G}. La Forêt de Karpluse vous inflige 1 blessure.
foreignNames.flavor: Parmi les pics neigeux acérés, des bandes de forêt à feuilles persistantes fournissent l'abri parfait aux bandes nomades de pillards orques et gobelins.

foreignNames.name: Foresta di Karplus
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G}. La Foresta di Karplus ti infligge 1 danno.
foreignNames.flavor: Tra i picchi innevati e frastagliati, i densi appezzamenti di robusti sempreverdi offrono il rifugio perfetto per le bande nomadi di razziatori orchi e goblin.

foreignNames.name: カープルーザンの森
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：{R}か{G}を加える。カープルーザンの森はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 鋭く切り立ち雪を被った山頂の間に鬱蒼と生える常緑樹は、放浪するオークやゴブリンの略奪者にとって恰好の隠れ蓑になる。

foreignNames.name: Floresta Karplusana
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {G}. Floresta Karplusana causa 1 ponto de dano a você.
foreignNames.flavor: Situados entre picos escarpados cobertos de neve, os densos bosques perenes proporciornam a cobertura perfeita para bandos de saqueadores itinerantes de orcs e goblins.

foreignNames.name: 卡普路桑森林
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加{R}或{G}。卡普路桑森林对你造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 在嶙峋覆雪的山峰之间，茂密的耐寒常青树为四处游荡的半兽人和鬼怪突击队提供了完美掩护。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}. Karplusan Forest deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Molten Tributary
cards.text:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
Molten Tributary enters the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: Though dangerous, Shiv teems with both life and mana, making it a tempting destination for ambitious mages.

foreignNames.name: Geschmolzener Zufluss
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {R}.)
Der Geschmolzene Zufluss kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Shiv ist zwar gefährlich, aber auch voller Leben und Mana, was es für ambitionierte Magier zu einem verlockenden Reiseziel macht.

foreignNames.name: Afluente fundido
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {U} o {R}.)
El Afluente fundido entra al campo de batalla girado.
foreignNames.flavor: A pesar de sus peligros, en Shiv abundan tanto la vida como el maná, lo que lo convierte en un destino muy tentador para los magos más ambiciosos.

foreignNames.name: Chenal en fusion
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {R}.)
Le Chenal en fusion arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
foreignNames.flavor: Bien que dangereux, Shiv est une explosion de vie et de mana, ce qui en fait une destination attrayante pour les mages ambitieux.

foreignNames.name: Affluente Magmatico
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {U} o {R}.)
L'Affluente Magmatico entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Per quanto pericolosa, Shiv pullula di vita e di mana, che ne fanno una meta allettante per i maghi più ambiziosi.

foreignNames.name: 溶鉄の支流
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{U}か{R}を加える。）
溶鉄の支流はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: 危険であるにしろ、シヴは生命とマナを湛え、野心家の邪術師にとっては魅力的な場所なのである。

foreignNames.name: Afluente Derretido
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {U} ou {R}.)
Afluente Derretido entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Mesmo perigosa, Shiv é rica em vida e mana, o que faz dela um destino tentador para magos ambiciosos.

foreignNames.name: 熔火支流
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{U}或{R}。）
熔火支流须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 西瓦虽然危机四伏，但其勃勃生机与充沛法力仍令无数有志法师心向往之。

cards.originalText:
({T}: Add {U} or {R}.)
Molten Tributary enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Plaza of Heroes
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell.
{T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary permanents you control.
{3}, {T}, Exile Plaza of Heroes: Target legendary creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

foreignNames.name: Gedenkplatz der Helden
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Gib dieses Mana nur aus, um einen legendären Zauberspruch zu wirken.
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe einer legendären bleibenden Karte, die du kontrollierst.
{3}, {T}, schicke den Gedenkplatz der Helden ins Exil: Eine legendäre Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Fluchsicherheit und Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges.

foreignNames.name: Plaza de los héroes
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color. Usa este maná solo para lanzar un hechizo legendario.
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color entre los permanentes legendarios que controlas.
{3}, {T}, exiliar la Plaza de los héroes: La criatura legendaria objetivo gana las habilidades de antimaleficio e indestructible hasta el final del turno.

foreignNames.name: Esplanade des héros
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer un sort légendaire.
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix parmi les couleurs des permanents légendaires que vous contrôlez.
{3}, {T}, exilez l'Esplanade des héros : une créature légendaire ciblée acquiert la défense talismanique et l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignNames.name: Piazza degli Eroi
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare una magia leggendaria.
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore tra i permanenti leggendari che controlli.
{3}, {T}, Esilia la Piazza degli Eroi: Una creatura leggendaria bersaglio ha anti-malocchio e indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno.

foreignNames.name: 英雄の公有地
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。このマナは、伝説の呪文を唱えるためにしか支払えない。
{T}：あなたがコントロールしている伝説のパーマネントの中の色１色のマナ１点を加える。
{3},{T},英雄の公有地を追放する：伝説のクリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは呪禁と破壊不能を得る。

foreignNames.name: Praça dos Heróis
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor. Gaste este mana somente para conjurar uma mágica lendária.
{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor entre as permanentes lendárias que você controla.
{3}, {T}, exile Praça dos Heróis: A criatura lendária alvo ganha resistência a magia e indestrutível até o final do turno.

foreignNames.name: 群英广场
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。此法术力只能用来施放传奇咒语。
{T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为由你操控之传奇永久物所具有的任一颜色。
{3}，{T}，放逐群英广场：目标传奇生物获得辟邪与不灭异能直到回合结束。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a legendary spell.
{T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary permanents you control.
{3}, {T}, Exile Plaza of Heroes: Target legendary creature gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Radiant Grove
cards.text:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Radiant Grove enters the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: Yavimaya's inhabitants are dedicated to protecting its unspoiled jungle from the scourge of artifice.

foreignNames.name: Strahlender Hain
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {G} oder {W}.)
Der Strahlende Hain kommt getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Bewohner von Yavimaya setzen alles daran, seinen unberührten Dschungel vor der Geißel des Handwerks zu schützen.

foreignNames.name: Arboleda radiante
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {G} o {W}.)
La Arboleda radiante entra al campo de batalla girada.
foreignNames.flavor: Los moradores de Yavimaya protegen su inmaculada selva del azote del artificio.

foreignNames.name: Bosquet radieux
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {W}.)
Le Bosquet radieux arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé.
foreignNames.flavor: Les habitants de la Yavimaya sont dévoués à la protection de sa jungle vierge du fléau de l'artifice.

foreignNames.name: Boschetto Radioso
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {G} o {W}.)
Il Boschetto Radioso entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli abitanti di Yavimaya sono dediti alla protezione della giungla incontaminata dalla piaga dell'artificio.

foreignNames.name: 光輝の木立ち
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{G}か{W}を加える。）
光輝の木立ちはタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: ヤヴィマヤの住人は、大量の人工物からその無垢なる森を守ることを使命としている。

foreignNames.name: Bosque Radiante
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {G} ou {W}.)
Bosque Radiante entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Os habitantes de Yavimaya protegem sua selva imaculada do flagelo do artifício.

foreignNames.name: 华光树丛
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{G}或{W}。）
华光树丛须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 亚维马雅丛林尚未受战火波及，而其间生灵均致力保卫此处免遭奇械劫运降临。

cards.originalText:
({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)
Radiant Grove enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Sacred Peaks
cards.text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
Sacred Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor: Everyone is welcome in the floating Serran cities, though few but the most faithful attempt the ascent.

foreignNames.name: Heilige Gipfel
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {W}.)
Die Heiligen Gipfel kommen getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: In den schwebenden Städten Serras sind alle willkommen, doch wenige außer den Treuesten versuchen den Aufstieg.

foreignNames.name: Cumbres sagradas
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Agrega {R} o {W}.)
Las Cumbres sagradas entran al campo de batalla giradas.
foreignNames.flavor: Las ciudades flotantes de Serra acogen a todo el mundo, pero solo los más fervorosos creyentes intentan alcanzarlas.

foreignNames.name: Pics sacrés
foreignNames.text:
({T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {W}.)
Les Pics sacrés arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagés.
foreignNames.flavor: Tout le monde est le bienvenu dans les cités flottantes de Serra, mais seuls les plus croyants tentent l'ascension.

foreignNames.name: Picchi Sacri
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Aggiungi {R} o {W}.)
I Picchi Sacri entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpati.
foreignNames.flavor: Chiunque è il benvenuto nelle città fluttuanti di Serra, ma solo i più fedeli tentano l'ascesa.

foreignNames.name: 聖なる峰
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：{R}か{W}を加える。）
聖なる峰はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.flavor: セラの浮遊都市は誰でも受け入れるが、そこに昇ろうと試みるのは最も信心深い者だけである。

foreignNames.name: Picos Sagrados
foreignNames.text:
({T}: Adicione {R} ou {W}.)
Picos Sagrados entra no campo de batalha virado.
foreignNames.flavor: Todos são bem-vindos nas cidades flutuantes de Serra, embora apenas os mais devotos arrisquem a subida.

foreignNames.name: 圣洁山峰
foreignNames.text:
（{T}：加{R}或{W}。）
圣洁山峰须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 漂浮空中的撒拉都市欢迎所有人到访，但仅有寥寥无几的虔诚信徒才会尝试跻身其间。

cards.originalText:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
Sacred Peaks enters the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Shivan Reef
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor: The boiling seas around Shiv provided a welcome layer of protection for the reclaimed Mana Rig.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn't use the stack and can't be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.

foreignNames.name: Shivanisches Riff
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {R}. Das Shivanische Riff fügt dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Das kochende Meer rund um Shiv bot einen willkommenen Schutz für die erneuerte Manabarkasse.

foreignNames.name: Arrecife shivano
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega {U} o {R}. El Arrecife shivano te hace 1 punto de daño.
foreignNames.flavor: Los mares hirvientes de Shiv ofrecían una conveniente capa de protección a la instalación de maná reformada.

foreignNames.name: Brisants shivâns
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {R}. Les Brisants shivâns vous infligent 1 blessure.
foreignNames.flavor: Les mers bouillonnantes entourant Shiv fournissaient une précieuse barrière de protection pour la Plate-forme de mana récupérée.

foreignNames.name: Barriera di Shiv
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {R}. La Barriera di Shiv ti infligge 1 danno.
foreignNames.flavor: I mari ribollenti intorno a Shiv rappresentano un gradito livello di protezione per il rivendicato Impianto di Mana.

foreignNames.name: シヴの浅瀬
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：{U}か{R}を加える。シヴの浅瀬はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: シヴ山の周辺にある煮え立つ海は、再生したマナ・リグにとって安全な居場所だった。

foreignNames.name: Recifes de Shiv
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{T}: Adicione {U} ou {R}. Recifes de Shiv causa 1 ponto de dano a você.
foreignNames.flavor: Os mares ferventes em torno de Shiv oferecem uma camada de proteção muito bem-vinda à recém-recuperada Plataforma de Mana.

foreignNames.name: 西瓦暗礁
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{T}：加{U}或{R}。西瓦暗礁对你造成1点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 西瓦周边的沸腾洋面，为重新夺回的魔力钻探机提供了一道不可多得的防御天堑。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

cards.name: Sulfurous Springs
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Sulfurous Springs deals 1 damage to you.
cards.flavor: Everything is flammable in the Burning Isles, even the mana itself.

foreignNames.name: Schwefelquellen
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {R}. Die Schwefelquellen fügen dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreignNames.flavor: Auf den Brennenden Inseln ist alles brennbar, sogar das Mana selbst.

foreignNames.name: Manantiales sulfurosos
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {R}. Los Manantiales sulfurosos te hacen 1 punto de daño.
foreignNames.flavor: En las Islas Ardientes, incluso el maná puede incendiarse.

foreignNames.name: Sources sulfureuses
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R}. Les Sources sulfureuses vous infligent 1 blessure.
foreignNames.flavor: Tout est inflammable dans les Îles Ardentes, même le mana.

foreignNames.name: Sorgenti Sulfuree
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R}. Le Sorgenti Sulfuree ti infliggono 1 danno.
foreignNames.flavor: Tutto è infiammabile nelle Isole Ardenti, persino il mana stesso.

foreignNames.name: 硫黄泉
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{T}：{B}か{R}を加える。硫黄泉はあなたに１点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 炎熱の島々では、マナを含めてすべてが可燃性である。

foreignNames.name: Fontes Sulfurosas

cards.name: Thran Portal
cards.text:
Thran Portal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
As Thran Portal enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Thran Portal is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
Mana abilities of Thran Portal cost an additional 1 life to activate.

rulings.text: Thran Portal will have the appropriate intrinsic mana ability for the basic land type chosen as it enters the battlefield. It is still a Gate and still has its other abilities, including the last ability, which makes the mana ability associated with its basic land type cost 1 life to activate.
You still have to pay that mana ability’s other costs. Usually, this is just tapping the land.
If Thran Portal somehow gains another mana ability, that ability also costs an additional 1 life to activate.

If you control more than one Thran Portal, the last ability of each of them applies only to itself. That is, controlling a second Thran Portal does not make mana abilities of all cards named Thran Portal cost an additional 2 life.

If a Thran Portal somehow enters the battlefield without a basic land type having been chosen for it, it does not have any mana abilities. The same is true for a land that is already on the battlefield that becomes a copy of it.

If a land enters the battlefield as a copy of Thran Portal (as opposed to a land that is already on the battlefield becoming a copy of it), its controller gets to choose a basic land type for it and it has that type.

cards.name: Tyrannical Pitlord
cards.text:
Flying, trample
As Tyrannical Pitlord enters the battlefield, choose another creature you control.
The chosen creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.
When Tyrannical Pitlord leaves the battlefield, sacrifice the chosen creature.

rulings.text: The ability of Tyrannical Pitlord that allows you to choose a creature isn’t a triggered ability and doesn’t use the stack. Players can’t respond to your choice of which creature it’s affecting.
If Tyrannical Pitlord enters the battlefield at the same time as another creature, that creature can’t be chosen.
If the chosen creature leaves the battlefield, you can’t choose a new creature.
If another player gains control of the chosen creature while Tyrannical Pitlord is still on the battlefield, that creature will continue to have flying and get +3/+3.
If Tyrannical Pitlord’s leaves-the-battlefield triggered ability resolves while its controller is not the same as the controller of the chosen creature, that creature will not be sacrificed.

cards.name: Baird, Argivian Recruiter
cards.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you control a creature with power greater than its base power, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

rulings.text: Normally, a creature’s base power and toughness are the power and toughness printed on the card or, for a token, the power and toughness set by the effect that created it. If another effect sets a creature’s power and toughness to specific numbers or values, those become its base power and toughness. If an effect modifies a creature’s power and/or toughness without setting them, that is not included when determining its base power and toughness.

If a creature has a characteristic-defining ability that sets its power and toughness, indicated with a */* or similar in the power and toughness box, that ability is taken into account when determining its base power and toughness.

Some creatures have base power and toughness 0/0 and an ability that gives them a bonus based on some criteria. Those are not characteristic-defining abilities, and that ability doesn’t change its base power and toughness.

cards.name: Ertai Resurrected
cards.text:
Flash
When Ertai Resurrected enters the battlefield, choose up to one —
• Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. Its controller draws a card.
• Destroy another target creature or planeswalker. Its controller draws a card.

rulings.text: Activated abilities are written in the form “Cost: Effect.” Some keyword abilities, such as equip and crew, are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder texts.

Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re often written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].” Some keyword abilities, such as prowess and fabricate, are triggered abilities and will have “when,” “whenever,” or “at” in their reminder text.

If you counter a delayed triggered ability that triggers at the beginning of the “next” occurrence of a specified step or phase, that ability won’t trigger again the following time that phase or step occurs.

Abilities that create replacement effects, such as a permanent entering the battlefield tapped or with counters on it, can’t be targeted. Abilities that apply “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” are also replacement effects and can’t be targeted. Similarly, the replacement effect that prevents a creature with a stun counter on it from untapping can’t be countered.

cards.name: Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever a player casts a spell that targets only a single creature other than Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief, you may copy that spell. The copy targets Ivy. (A copy of an Aura spell becomes a token.)

rulings.text: The second ability triggers whenever a player casts a spell that targets only one creature and no other object or player. It doesn’t matter who controls the creature.
If a spell has multiple targets but all of them are the same creature, Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief’s second ability will trigger.
The copy is created even if the spell that caused the ability to trigger has been countered by the time the ability resolves. The copy resolves before the original spell.
If Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief isn’t a legal target for the spell, no copy can be created.
The copy that Ivy, Gleeful Spellthief’s second ability creates is created on the stack, so it’s not “cast.” Other abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell won’t trigger.
If the spell that’s copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copy will have the same mode. You can’t choose a different one.
If the spell that’s copied has an X whose value was determined as it was cast, the copy has the same value of X.

The controller of a copy can’t choose to pay any additional costs for the copy. However, effects based on any additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copy too. Notably, if the spell you copy was kicked, the copies will also be kicked.
